page.title: 18THE PEAR ORCHARD
page.content: The pear orchard is 135 acres,the pears are used to make Babycham (a champagne type drink),there are also a few trees with edible fruit.The pears are harvested in the Autumn.First of all the workers come along in a tractor with a machine on the back which clamps round the trees and shakes down all the fruit.Then another machine comes along which lifts the pears and puts them into boxes.There are sheep in the orchard which graze nearly all year round.There are two cattle grids,which stop the sheep from getting out onto the road.The orchard is sectioned and more grids keep the sheep for wandering.There are also 20 bee-hives in the orchard and in the spring they train the Beagles in and around the orchard.
